title: Bandits Abduct Two in Kwara Hours After President's 'Victory' Claim
description: Armed bandits abducted two individuals in Kwara state shortly after President Tinubu claimed victory over terrorism.

title: Insecurity Escalates in Kwara South with Repeated Bandit Attacks
description: Communities in Kwara South, particularly Ekiti LGA, have faced repeated bandit attacks leaving families grieving.
